subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: No one has benefited from the injuries to Carlos Beltrán, Endy Chávez, Ryan Church and Ben Johnson more than Ángel Pagán, who has made the most of his at-bats this spring.
snippet: No one has benefited from the injuries to Carlos Beltrán, Endy Chávez, Ryan Church and Ben Johnson more than Ángel Pagán, who has made the most of his at-bats this spring.
